pyqgis_plugin.name: POI Lookup
pyqgis_plugin.about: POI Lookup This algorithm takes a XY Point and generates a map of features around the point. Input LAT, LON Coordinate: LAT and LON Coordinate of the point. The LAT and LON must be deliminated by either a space or a comma Input Map Scale: Scale factor to zoom into the entered point. 50 - 100 is usually a good starting place. Larger number zoom out. The lowest scale is 10. Input Append Map Scale: The will append the scale factor to the end of the output filename. Output PDF File: Path to the output PDF file.
pyqgis_plugin.author: Scott Buchanan
